title: Mike Levin
deleted: Levin has said that his leading priority as a candidate for the House is "Accelerating Sustainable Energy and Environmental Protection". He wishes to put his district "at the forefront of clean energy economic growth". He believes "strongly in the overwhelming scientific consensus that climate change is driven by human activity". His other priorities include "Holding Washington Accountable", "Providing Affordable Healthcare Coverage for All", and "Achieving World-Class Education". He opposes efforts "to privatize public education", supports expansion of bilingual instruction, and promises to "advocate for solutions like the College for All Act, which aims to eliminate tuition and fees at public four-year colleges and universities for students from families that make up to $125,000 per year, and would make community college tuition-free for all income levels".<ref name="Priorities" /><ref name="Issues">{{cite web |title=49th Congressional District candidate Mike Levin on the issues |url=http://www.sandiegouniontribune.com/opinion/commentary/sd-utbg-49th-congressional-district-candidate-mike-levin-20180517-story.html |newspaper=The San Diego Union-Tribune |access-date=September 24, 2018}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |last1=Cabrera |first1=Marissa |last2=Cavanaugh |first2=Maureen |title=Democrat Mike Levin Aims To Champion Clean Energy, Health Care And Education |url=https://www.kpbs.org/news/2018/apr/24/democrat-mike-levin-aims-champion-clean-energy-hea/ |publisher=KPBS |access-date=September 24, 2018}}</ref>

He has also emphasized his support for [[Planned Parenthood]], "which provides essential preventative and reproductive health care services like cancer screenings, [[Sexually transmitted disease|STD]] testing and low-cost birth control to millions of American women", and for "federal legislation that specifically bans sexual harassment". In addition, he supports an [[assault weapon]]s ban and "a path to citizenship for law-abiding undocumented immigrants".<ref name="Priorities" /><ref name="Issues" />

title: Mike Levin
added: Levin campaigned with a platform focused on energy and environmental issues.<ref>{{cite news |last1=options |first1=Show more sharing |last2=URLCopied! |first2=Copy Link |title=49th Congressional District candidate Mike Levin on the issues |url=https://www.sandiegouniontribune.com/opinion/commentary/sd-utbg-49th-congressional-district-candidate-mike-levin-20180517-story.html |access-date=10 March 2021 |work=San Diego Union-Tribune |date=17 May 2018}}</ref>
